comment:
* The base class for all virtual input devices such as VirtualKeyboard, VirtualMouse.
 * This implements the shared functionality such as closing the device and keeping track of
 * identifiers.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: mVirtualDevice
variables.comment: * The virtual device to which this VirtualInputDevice belongs to.

variables.name: mToken
variables.comment: * The token used to uniquely identify the virtual input device.

methods.name: public int getInputDeviceId()
methods.comment:
* @return The device id of this device.
     * @hide
